text: Ian gumazir dapaniba ian akurvaghasa zurara ian gari. Egh me gɨn ingangarir me amizibar gun God ko mɨkɨmam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia men akaba baragh egh men apengan ikɨ. Ia kamaghɨn damutɨ, me bar akuegh uan ingangarim damuam. Ia kamaghɨn damuan koghtɨ, me osɨmtɨzim sara ian ganam, eghtɨ bizir kam ian akuraghan kogham.
